casebody.data:
State
v.
Marvin Wade Millsaps 374P13-6 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2016

Barry H. Bloch, Assistant Attorney General, Sarah Kirkman, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

Marvin W. Millsaps, Pro Se.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of April 2016 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of June 2016."
